name: Portbase
goal: The Portbase Port Community System (PCS) is the digital connection to smart Dutch ports. The PCS has almost national coverage and is available for all port sectors: containers, general cargo, dry bulk and liquid bulk. Everyone in the logistics chain can exchange information via PCS easily and efficiently.
interests: Customs, Digital economy and society, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU MSW environment regulation - DG MOVE, Electronic Freight Transport Information regulation - DG MOVE,
ICS2 - DG TAXUD
